website_summaries.verdict: Lean out and gain muscle with a workout bar that can stand up to abuse.
pros: This foam-padded rubber bar is extremely durable and built to last
Geared toward improving stability, core strength, and durance, this bar can be order in weights ranging from 4 to 36 pounds
Measures 71.5 inches long with a 1.55-inch diameter
Stores easily under a bed or in a closet
cons: The bar is rather long, which can make working out awkward depending on your size

customer_reviews.title: Body Solid Tools.
customer_reviews.text: Was using a weight machine when my 24 lb. bar arrived love this solidly built bar.. Never use a weight machine again. Ordering more bars, different weights. These are excellent for working out and weight is true. Machines are easy compared to these real weight bars. Ordered 30 pound bar five minutes ago. I'm 76 years old and going up in weight slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Boer58

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: At my age who needs a gym to stay in shape? I have two bars of varying weights and use of them ever other day keep my chest and arms strong and pumped. My company gym has a whole set off them. Sturdy. Long lasting. No real wear, even on the soft, comfortable bar covers after multiple years of use . Would definitely buy again . . . but they last forever . . . so no need.
customer_reviews.author: RW Powers

customer_reviews.title: Weighted bar for home exercises
customer_reviews.text: I love having a 36lb weighted bar as that is hard to find. My only problem is that it is way too long! If only it could have been denser so that there would be no need to make it so long!! Not everyone is 6 foot tall and stocky! Some of us are petite and wish to get stronger. I really do not know how much I shall use it as I find the length to be a formidable problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Being

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: The best I've ordered. This is my fourth attempt to get a good weighted bar. And, the best. A previous review named the other three bars that I had ordered but Amazon would not allow that. So, no names this time. Just get this one.
customer_reviews.author: WJG

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost daily after doing my cardio. I mainly use it for curling. And also when doing squats to give me that bit of extra weight evenly distributed across my entire body frame. Very well built and know it will last indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: dwj

customer_reviews.title: Body Solid Padded Weight Bar
customer_reviews.text: Thick, comfortable, heavily padded, soft grip, colorful coding system. I have bought several of these, and although the price increases the heavier you go, I have found these to be of excellent quality, and use them often. These colorful padded weight bars were a wonderful addition to our family exercise room, and having the lighter weight bars (6 and 9 LB) make it easy for the whole family (with varying fitness levels) to join in. So easy and comfortable to use! I can't wait to finish my collection with the addition of the heaviest bars!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I find working with the bar is easier than working with free weights. This bar initially feels heavier than nine pounds, but after a while levels out. This is a good buy. I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthg

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, durable, easy on the wrist
customer_reviews.text: I have had the 24 lb bar for over 6 months now. I love how comfortable it is on my shoulders and how nice the foam is on my wrists. The construction is durable. I can easily store it under the bed without worry of damage the wood floor and it won't roll away from me.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonian

customer_reviews.title: This 12# bar is great for people with shoulder pain or tendonitis
customer_reviews.text: This 12# bar is great for people with shoulder pain or tendonitis. I use it on my inversion table and for areobic workouts to music. So perfect for stretching and a faster movement. I can also simulate my kayaking stroke for brief periods which also gets the heart rate going. The qaulity is very good, it's just a matter of what weight works for your needs. I have the 12 and 36, and may get the 24 or 30. The 36 is 6' long and good for press or curls. So pick 3 different bars for different workouts, if I were to only have one, probably the 24 or 30.
customer_reviews.author: james t sands

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bar is an awesome workout. I use it for squats, two-handed curls, reverse two-handed curls, and more. However, the bar is almost 2 meters wide. This makes it difficult to manuver, if you plan on doing that. I have it in my basement and it restricts some exercises for me, like benching. It is nicely padded like the other reviews say. You may also experience unbalancing while lifting which is normal, not a defect. If your a hero and plan on overcoming your limit by purchasing the 36 pounder, you will probably experience this unbalance.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 20-year-old chrome barbell with this. The weighted bar is "foamy" and feels much better. I expect it to remain in excellent condition for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Longstreet

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these will buy the rest soon For some reason I didn’t think it would be so long, just more dense, but it is a lengthy bar
customer_reviews.author: Avg. consumer REAL REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Love using them
customer_reviews.text: Using them for PT arm exercises. When I want to add weight I put my ankle weights around them.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to hold but unfortunately had to sell ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to hold but unfortunately had to sell them since my husband thinks I was lifting too much weight 😀 I will say before very knowledgeable and work with a professional when using heavy weights cause at times I got injured because of my own negligence
customer_reviews.author: Berts

customer_reviews.title: Quality bar!
customer_reviews.text: Most guys I know have a hard time believing this bar is heavy.. for them. Great cushion protection! Love everything about being stronger with this bar. Very durable, wonderful for bar workout needs. This is a staple in my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: SAMANTHA Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home gym
customer_reviews.text: Great workout weight. I use it several times a week and absolutely love it. I've bought several sizes so far and I am very pleased. I store mine in a corner without any issues. I really love not having to deal with clunky weights. I have tile floors and one of my fears was dropping a heave weight on the floor. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M.

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer that the material covering the bar was thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amos

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these bars. They are easy to use and durable. As I increase my weight I will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Kim Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these bars. Very durable and easy to use. As i increase the weight I will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Kim Long

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic deal. I love this bar
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic deal. I love this bar. Shipping was quick & the transaction easy! The only thing I did notice is that the weight on the bar is not evenly distributed across but all in all its great !
customer_reviews.author: Denise Berger

customer_reviews.title: Love this bar
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar, but came with little protection and the foam wrap had some tears in it.... Nothing some electrical tape won't fix but sucks when you buy new. Too heavy to bother with return...
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Kane

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a bar for a long time. We use these in the gym and was wanting to add to my home routine. This came with free shipping. I felt this was a great price for this item especially with no shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Lance

customer_reviews.title: 30 Lb weighted Bar
customer_reviews.text: good solid product so far no complaints. I use this for squats lunges dead lifts shoulder back and bicep curls. trying to build some muscle and this bar gives me variety from using free weights. I would recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Terry R

customer_reviews.title: very solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: rubber did not rub off or come off. very solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for casual home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly as advertised. Great to have for casual home workouts. I didn't like going to the gym (for many reasons) but knew that I needed to lift weight for squatting positions, to help with back/core strength and overall posture. This bar is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: cl

customer_reviews.title: We just moved so it took me a while to ...
customer_reviews.text: We just moved so it took me a while to open it. One cap fell off when I took it out and it had a rip in the bar. it is my fault for not opening right away but we were still unpacking so I am stuck with it. Don't trust the packing and open it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for living room workouts
customer_reviews.text: I love my bar amd plan to buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Got a heavier one first, too much weight yet for me, but this is perfect for getting started!!
customer_reviews.author: MSS Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Great service. Product is exactly as described and amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fantastic price and excellent shipping speed! Would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Fox2star

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for warming up and toning. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great padding and very fast delivery. Looking forward to give it a good use.
customer_reviews.author: PONDI

customer_reviews.title: Great for waking up the muscles
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bar is nicely padded. It's great for quick squats, biceps curls, light shrugs and military press among other exercies. Great for pre-workout warm ups as well.
customer_reviews.author: Art Vinogradsky

customer_reviews.title: Good quality weight bar for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Received this bar yesterday and it appears to be exactly as advertised. Haven't had much time to use it yet, but it seems to be very well made and the weight is balanced throughout bar. Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: PT Help
customer_reviews.text: This item was sent quickly. It also is working perfectly for my physical therapy exercises. Good quality. Only complaint is that it is just a trifle too long otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Bee

customer_reviews.title: So heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Heavier than I thought it would be. Could have gone with a lower weight but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: edwards

customer_reviews.title: I hate going to the gym so I bought this as ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate going to the gym so I bought this as an alternative. I use it for doing lunges, squats, biceps and triceps. Definitely easy to use and already seeing some muscle!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Graeff

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this weighted bar!! It is high quality..comfortable and now my favorite tool to get fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new 12 pound body bar but received a used 18 pound body bar with a slightly damaged cushion.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The item was good, too long for what I needed

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 20lb bar and will be ordering other weights as well. Super comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! The only thing I don't like was the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! The only thing I don't like was the carrier who delivered my bar, they nicked my bar and scratched it due to poor handling, but over all item was as expected..
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Trieu

customer_reviews.title: Very effective training tool
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how fast I received this. It more than met my expectations.the bar is easy to use and was inexpensive compared to what i could find locally.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Presley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: The bar arrived on time and is exactly what I expected. It is perfect! I love these bars and will continue to order them until I have the complete set!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bohan

customer_reviews.title: Nice upper body  bar
customer_reviews.text: I used a similar 4 pound bar in physical therapy so I was excited to find one at an excellent price. It arrived carefully packaged without any assembly. It's a great piece of exercise equipment for upper body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Length Advertised is Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT 60 inches as advertised under "Dimensions" in the specifications. It's 48 inches, just like other bars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We didn't care for the length was not sutible for what we wanted it for

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 18-pound bar arrived in good shape, and I'm very much enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri S. Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bar. Just what I was looking for. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I love it-the soft edges are ideal for those with a home gym. It won't do too much damage if you bump a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Kem Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice workout bar
customer_reviews.text: It is a weighted workout bar.....only works if I make it. Not a whole lot to say.
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Weights shift inside.  Easy to fix.
customer_reviews.text: Good bar for the price. Durable padding, rubber end caps. The weights inside the bar, which are packed in sand, have a tendancy to shift. After returning two bars because of this defect, I finally pulled off the end cap and added a little more sand. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: jmt

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Oh body bar, how do I love the? Let me count the ways!
customer_reviews.author: Teneika Punch

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but so awesome 🏋🏽‍♀️🏋🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I luv my exercise gotta have it at least 3 times a week. I alternate between the gym, the park and mostly my living room for my workout routines. I decided to get this bar because I wanted to get a complete workout in that was effective but not too strenuous just like I'm used to. And I got it!!! I got this bar and I luv it. It's just right for the arms and back and then squats. For 18lbs there's some weight but just right for me. I used it in the park this past weekend and it was just the right thing. I do a variety of moves with the bar and its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still a great product,
customer_reviews.text: Much taller than I had expected, almost six feet tall. Still a great product,
customer_reviews.author: KStrem

customer_reviews.title: Great for your home gym. 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: Dynamite product. Great for your home gyms. Highly Recommended, very clean very neat.
customer_reviews.author: DP23

customer_reviews.title: Great body bar
customer_reviews.text: This body bar is exactly what I was looking for. It's a great weight/size and can be used for a wide variety of exercises. Definitely beats fighting over the limited quantities they have at the gym! Totally worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice....
customer_reviews.text: Great bar, not 5*because I wish manufacturers would mark bar for different grips, other than that it's well made and perfect for all sorts of cross training exercises
customer_reviews.author: kfaciane

customer_reviews.title: It's a weight bar...
customer_reviews.text: It's a weight bar and does exactly what it says on the tin. It's well made and sturdy. For my should exercises it should last me a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: albionphotoTop Contributor: Anime

customer_reviews.title: Great for hip flexors and leg strength
customer_reviews.text: Used one of these with my personal trainer and it really distributes the weight evenly across the leg rather than using ankle weights.
customer_reviews.author: L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Body Solid bars! They are of high quality, and the color coded ends help me know which one to reach for without reading the ends. We own several now, and use them in some way in virtually every workout! Can't say enough good things about them! The 12 and 15 pound bars are particularly useful for warming up and stretching.
customer_reviews.author: DocLJo

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitness Tool
customer_reviews.text: Some of my fitness videos use these weighted bars. I already had a 9 pound and a 24 pound bar but I needed one in between the two. This is perfect. The bar is a little padded, making it comfortable to hold. To me it is a lot handier to have a couple different weighted bars to pick up than adding or taking off weights from one bar. Amazon had the best price and with free shipping it was the best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Bell

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier with the quality and the shipment promptness
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I thought it would be when I ordered; couldn't be happier with the quality and the shipment promptness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like to do certain isolation exercises with lighter weights and high reps with padded bar instead of using my Olympic set. I purchased the 15 lb. and the 24 lb.

customer_reviews.title: so that it sounds like a maraca when I use it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with loose debris inside, so that it sounds like a maraca when I use it. I like it tho.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!

We own several now, and use them in some way in virtually every workout! Can't say enough good things about them! The 12 and 15 pound bars are particularly useful for warming up and stretching.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: It is just what it says it is. If you don't have room for a bunch of dumbbells this is a great product. You can use it for a number of exercises. The padding on the bar is wonderful, not rough and cold like regular barbell.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great fitness tool!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great for workouts where lots of weight is not the goal. Easy to grip. Soft on the shoulders and neck. Could even be a little thicker with less length for the same weight.

customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my daughter who is an M.D. and in her first year of her residency. She has little time to go to the gym at this time and to my amazement this body bar has allowed her to keep up with her upper body strength. I would highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.text: Great for home gyms, arrived early and it's been incredibly useful for training at home or in a small local gym. Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light grey 36lb a few weeks ago, and I loved it. Takes up less space, padded, and so many uses! 2 days later I went back and ordered the blue 18lb, and the purple 24lb. They arrived yesterday, and I'm just as happy. The only difference is the lighter weighted bars are shorter - no biggie. These are a great addition the the home gym we are creating, and I will definitely order a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G.
